name: BLE01A
short_en: This module can add wireless comunication capability to your project via Bluetooth Low Energy protocol. This module uses NRF8001 chip, wich comunicates with the host controler via SPI the interface.
longname_en: Module with the NRF8001 Bluetooth Low Energy chip from Nordic Semiconductor
longname_cs: Modul s Bluetooth Low Energy ƒçipem Nordic Semiconductor NRF8001
